name: dogs and games for kids - free game
name_original: dogs and games for kids - free game
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8).

This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:

In this game your child drives a bowling ball. The goal is to collect as many pins without ever touching the edges of the track. This is both a game of skill and speed. Playable one or two players. For each level passed your child wins a dog photo.

second game:

In this shooting game your child will need to be fast and accurate. To win he will have to drop a maximum of metal cans with the ball. At each level passed your child wins a dog photo.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of dogs.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of dogs to release.

The following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
